scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm --parallel -r clean && pnpm store prune
scripts.clean:purge: pnpm run clean && pnpm store clear
scripts.migrate:create: docker compose up -d {{database}} {{#is_mongo}}-d mongo-init{{/is_mongo}} && pnpm -r run migrate:create
scripts.migrate:down: docker compose up -d {{database}} {{#is_mongo}}-d mongo-init{{/is_mongo}} && pnpm -r run migrate:down
scripts.migrate:init: docker compose up -d {{database}} {{#is_mongo}}-d mongo-init{{/is_mongo}} && sleep 5 && pnpm -r run migrate:init
scripts.migrate:up: docker compose up -d {{database}} {{#is_mongo}}-d mongo-init{{/is_mongo}} && pnpm -r run migrate:up
scripts.migrate:create: docker compose up -d {{database}} {{#is_mongo}}-d mongo-init{{/is_mongo}} && bun --filter='*' run migrate:create
scripts.migrate:down: docker compose up -d {{database}} {{#is_mongo}}-d mongo-init{{/is_mongo}} && bun --filter='*' run migrate:down
scripts.migrate:init: docker compose up -d {{database}} {{#is_mongo}}-d mongo-init{{/is_mongo}} && sleep 5 && bun --filter='*' run migrate:init
scripts.migrate:up: docker compose up -d {{database}} {{#is_mongo}}-d mongo-init{{/is_mongo}} && bun --filter='*' run migrate:up
